meta.title: Monroe School District #1J - Monroe, Oregon - Serving K-12

meta.name: description
meta.content: Our School District serves the community of Monroe, Oregon by providing K-12 education. The city of Monroe is nestled against the first foothills of the Coast Range mountains, facing the Willamette Valley.
Monroe School District #1J - Monroe, Oregon - Serving K-12

Our School District serves the community of Monroe, Oregon by providing K-12 education. The city of Monroe is nestled against the first foothills of the Coast Range mountains, facing the Willamette Valley.
